title: How do I view internal App files in Android 11?
content:
Hello.

Recently, I tried to extract audio from an app in the Android/data/ directory but the default file manager app doesn't show anything there anymore! I tried installing a third party file manager but it returned with an "access denied" error.

I heard about this "Scoped Storage" thing, but I just want to know how I can access the internal files for apps that are usually in Android/data/.

Some help or a nudge in the right direction would be nice.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
